Content.Text:
<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
EEK!! Ohmigosh, you startled me! Um, h-hi,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh, no, it wasn't you suddenly saying hi that
startled me...
<PAGE>
It was more that I was just thinking about you,
and then BOOM, there you are right in front of
me, and--

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
URK! N-nothing! Forget I said anything!!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Wha? You want to go on a date?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Um! I, uhhhh...I-I don't NOT want to, but...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
I-I'll give it a try. No, I can do this! Dating? Bring
it on!!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Um...yeah...so uh, yes.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sure.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
N-no! It's not that I don't like being around you!
That's not it at all!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
...
I think I'll go home.
Do you want to break up?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I-I mean it! That's not what it is! I...I...!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry...It's just that, you're the first person
I've ever gone on a date with.
<PAGE>
Heck, you're the first person I've ever even had a
crush on.
<PAGE>
So, um, I have no idea at all what I'm supposed
to do...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
If someone else is there, then I can keep it
together enough to talk to you normally.
<PAGE>
But if it's just the two of us...it's too much for
me.
<PAGE>
Just talking to you is so overwhelming to me
that I can't speak straight. I'd stutter and trip over
my own tongue.
<PAGE>
It would be totally embarrassing to me if you
noticed that, though, so I'd try to stay quiet.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
But it's no fair to you if I'm quiet and sullen
when we're on a date. I'd totally understand you
getting mad about that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So I'm going to try my best to learn to talk to
you right. But if it takes time, could you please
be patient?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. I promise I really will try.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_EXCLAMATION_L>W-wait! <MYNAME>! I--
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT>Wha...?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It is just simple sleep deprivation. There is
nothing to worry about.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
She has told me many times of how, ever since
she began seeing you, she has been too excited
to sleep well.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It would be best to ask her directly for any
details, however. I expect she will wake up
soon.
<PAGE>
Now then, if you will excuse me. Don't hesitate
to call me if you need anything.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Mmm...EEP!! <MYNAME>?!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Huh...? Wait, why am I at the clinic...?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh. So I collapsed from sleep deprivation, and
you carried me here? Thanks. And I'm sorry I
worried you.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's wrong?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
WHAT?! Angela told you that!?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
...Yeah. It's true.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Ummm...please don't laugh at me for this, but...
<PAGE>
...you're the first person I've ever dated.
<PAGE>
No, you're actually the first person I've ever even
had a crush on.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm sure you've noticed, but there aren't that
many guys my age in this town.
<PAGE>
I went to an all-girls school, too. I never really
learned how to be with or talk to guys.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>So when it comes to dating, I have no idea what
I'm supposed to do or talk about.
<PAGE>
If someone else is there with me, I can
somehow manage to act naturally...
<PAGE>
...but I think I'd totally freeze up if I had to go
out on a date with just the two of us.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Just talking to you is so overwhelming to me
that I can't speak straight. I'd stutter and trip over
my own tongue.
<PAGE>
It would be totally embarrassing to me if you
noticed that, though, so I'd try to stay quiet.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>That's what happened earlier, you see. Then I
collapsed when you got mad...
<PAGE>
I've been nothing but a nuisance and a bother to
you, haven't I? I'm sorry.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wouldn't be surprised if you thought I was a
terrible girlfriend. Or even if you wanted to...to
break up with me.
<PAGE>
But I promise I'll try really hard to learn how to
speak to you normally. I really will.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>So, um... Could I please ask you to have just a
little more patience with me?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Th-thanks! I'll work really hard at it. I promise!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Um...I guess I should probably go home. I'm
feeling better now, so if I keep hanging around,
Angela will get mad.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>Would you please, um...not look to the side? I
think I'd die of embarrassment.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>Stay that way and listen, okay?
Um...<MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'm really glad you were my first date. Thanks.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...I love you.
